To  All staff
From  Cathy Chan
Subject  New accounts system ______________________________________________________________________________ Dear All Here is some information for using the new company accounts system. First of all, everyone needs a new password. Please email me if you donâ€™t have one. To start the program, touch the screen. Then click on your user name. Next, enter your password in upper case letters. After that, click on the account name. Key in the code in the CODE box. Finally, always log off when you finish. This is very important. If you need a hand with the new system, please email me at any time. Thanks Cathy Chan
